attributes.additional_details:
Since the Referendum the B.B.C bias especially in the News has been more in favour with the European Union.
Their opinion does not match the opinion of the majority of the British people.
The programs they broadcast are completely filled with biased opinion regarding the E.U.
attributes.background: The Biased B.B.C's agenda is more in line with the European Union and they no longer broadcast for the British licence fee payer.
